Steven Deffibaugh
=================

![Deffibaugh](https://princetontx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=2645)

Steven Deffibaugh, Council Member, Place 5
------------------------------------------

**Phone:**
972-736-2416
[Email Steven Deffibaugh](mailto:SDeffibaugh@princetontx.us)

Steven Deffibaugh was born in Borger, Texas, was married to his wife Judy for 46 years, and has one son and two grandkids. Some of his career highlights include serving in the Marine Corps, being a police officer for both the Van Alstyne and McKinney Police Departments, and being Collin County Fire Marshal, to name a few. His background includes serving two terms as Mayor for the City of Princeton; he currently serves as Mayor Pro Tempore and has been on the City Council since May of 2010.

He's also actively involved in several organizations, including serving as secretary of the Collin County Firefighters' Association, President of the Princeton Community Development Corporation, and Treasurer of the Former McKinney Police Officers Association. He also volunteered for the Princeton Fire Department from 1989 to 2018 before retiring as Assistant Chief.
